item.description:
Let's boogie downtown. Find a parking spot and meander to a few spots.

Tazza (their schedule hasn't been posted, usually have dj after 11)
meet first to socialize
8:45 - 10:30

Local 121
10:30 til ?
The owner/bartender of the Avery is DJing alternative + old 80s (alternative) similar to what he plays at the Avery but at 121 dancing is encouraged.

Join up at any time or break off the bigger group and meander somewhere else on your own/smaller groups (and report back so we have some new places to go next time). There are lots of options downtown, so time to have fun!

P.S. If you are more into techno, Friday is the night for you at Black Rep and local 121.
item.name: Night out Downtown /Tazza + Local 121
